title: Gunmen reportedly kill dozens in Nigeria as US military deployment confirmed
content: Shops and homes were torched in an attack on two villages in the western state of Kwara, a lawmaker says.

title: Zimbabwe's Mugabe latest former African leader to be mentioned in Epstein files
content: Epstein considered approaching Mugabe about a new currency in 2015 - the latest batch of files show.

content: Spokesperson says that cuts apply to about one-third of newsroom, with sport and international coverage largely gutted.

title: The F1, football and NFL figures who kept Epstein links after conviction
content: Senior figures in sport maintained personal contact with Jeffrey Epstein, while others were discussed regarding potential deals.
